title: Asisstance operation
body:
So this is a situation I encountered recently when I was playing.
I was playing twisted fate, one level in my q and one level in my e so no w to stun or slow.
My teamate nocturne runs past me to get me to help, he's on quarter health and I'm on full and so is the approaching enemy player.
He dies and pings me furiously saying I should have helped him. 
What should I have done?
P.S: my summoner spells were {{summoner:21}}  and {{summoner:4}}  so no {{summoner:7}} , pls don't bash me for my choice I'm still learning the game.

Thanks,
Mrocks22

replies.body: if you pinged your w by ctrl+lclick it would of displayed "not learned yet" in chat, he would probably understand but still be pissed since you got e instead of w second.
And I dunno why I named this thread that.
